alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 03 at 2:21PM MDT until April 05 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 14 inches. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Bighorn Canyon and Southern Big Horn. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Midnight MDT Tuesday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday commutes. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold and wet conditions could be dangerous for young livestock.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
